description: Make Thai green curry at home. This chicken curry recipe is loaded with flavour from zesty kaffir lime and spicy red chilli.
keywords: Green curry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Curry with Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1tbsp oil in a nonstick wok or frypan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and stir fry for 1 minute. Remove chicken and set aside.
Heat remaining oil in same pan, stirfry curry paste over low heat for 2 minutes. Add 150ml of coconut cream over medium heat.
Add fish sauce, sugar and beans, stir & add remaining coconut cream & water. Bring to the boil, simmer until beans are cooked.
Add chicken, chilli & kaffir lime leaves (if desired) and return to boil. Once chicken is cooked, add basil if using before removing from heat. Serve with steamed rice.
